document.full_text: acid-suppressing drugs like prilosec and prevacid may not be much help for infants with troublesome acid reflux, and there's too little evidence that they help older children and teenagers, a new research review concludes.
document.title: study questions heartburn drugs for kids
lines_and_colors: acid-suppressing drugs like prilosec and prevacid may not be much help for infants with troublesome acid reflux, and there's too little evidence that they help older children and teenagers, a new research review concludes.
